update(float) - Method in class sage.camera.controllers.ThirdPersonChaseCameraController
Updates this ThirdPersonChaseCameraController by determining the current target position, setting a new camera position based on the target position and the physics calculations for used for the spring system, and forcing the camera to look at the target node from its new position.
update(float) - Method in class sage.camera.controllers.ThirdPersonOrbitCameraController
Updates this ThirdPersonOrbitCameraController by determining the current target position, setting a new camera position based on the target position and the current azimuth, elevation, and distance values for the camera (that is, the current position of the camera relative to the target), calculating the snapback position of the azimuth, and forcing the camera to look at the target node from its new position.

update(float) - Method in class sage.input.InputManager
update(float time) causes the InputManager to update its information on the state of all input devices and then invoke, in the manner specified by the IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE of each component, any IActions associated with components.
